body:
@mwhudson 
Isn't there [`vendor`](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1Bz5-UB7g2uPBdOx-rw5t9MxJwkfpx90cqG9AFL0JAYo/edit) to solve this issue? Every package could (and probably should) include their own dependencies with their source making their building a breeze in terms of dependency management. And builds are static anyway.
